mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (name, username, password, address, email, phone_number, nickname, height, weight, age) VALUES (#{name}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{address}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{nickname}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{age})
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET name = #{name}, username = #{userName}, password = #{password}, address = #{address}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, nickname = #{nickname}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, age = #{age} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
